message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
I'll give you a 50/50 split. It's a fair deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal. Your turn again!
I'll give you a slightly better deal too. 48/52 is a good compromise!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting any younger!
I'll try to get closer to a 50/50 split. Let's meet in the middle at 51/49!
